title: Impacts of prescribed fire and mechanical shredding of aboveground vegetation for fire prevention on ecosystem properties, structure, functions and overall multi-functionality of a semi-arid pine forest
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 370

Author(s): Pedro Antonio Plaza-Álvarez, Manuel Esteban Lucas-Borja, María Dolores Carmona-Yáñez, Domingo Calderón Cortés, Miguel Ángel Rodríguez Hidalgo, Demetrio Antonio Zema
